actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest on deposits in certain savings institutions.
short_title: Small Savers Protection Tax Act of 1979

summary.text: Small Savers Protection Tax Act of 1979 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $250 ($500 for married individuals filing jointly) of the interest earned on a savings account in a bank, savings association, or credit union.

titles.title: Small Savers Protection Tax Act of 1979
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest on deposits in certain savings institutions.
